description:
Due to Shachi`s scheming, Kenshiro`s presence becomes known all across the land as "Raoh`s invasion." The Asuras cower, and the people eagerly await liberation. Relieved to hear this, Jukei tells of his past... He taught the three generals of Asura the North Star Lapis Lazuli Fist, and led to the creation of the Land of Asura. Furthermore, this Land of Asura was Raoh and Kenshiro`s birthplace...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kenshiro`s Secret Is Revealed! The Land of Asura Is His Motherland!!
Le terrible secret de Ken. Le pays des démons est sa terre natale.
暴かれたケンシロウの秘密! 修羅の国は母の国!!
